comment: Took this class as a summer 4 week session, super easy A! Ken Harmon is a funny guy and does not make your life hard at all. The work was very easy too, I got 100s on everything. There's a group presentation with one other person but it only took 2-3 mins so not stressful. He's also straight to the point and just gets to the important stuff.

Took him for summer semester, Acct data analytics, 4 days a week, pretty solid professor, straight forward, easy going, tries to have humor, long as you do the work you'll be good, presentation were easy, some groups took literally 1-2 minutes some took 5 min. He canceled two of the classes cause we were ahead

Ken Harmon is great! I took Accounting Data Analytics with him and enjoyed his instruction and approach. We worked on many examples in class and the HW was straightforward. I struggled with reading code at times but between the book, HW assignments, and Professor Harmon's help, I did well. Also, he's a very approachable gentleman.

Take him! These accounting classes are hard because there is so much to learn but, if you just do all of the assignments, I don't see how you could fail. There is a ton of assignments which is a blessing and a curse. His lectures were good, do the work, get an A. I met with Professor Harmon on Teams and would see him at the gym. Great guy!

TAKE THIS PROFESSOR!!! I took his accounting class online and was super nervous about it being online. There is normally 3-4 assignments on McGraw-Hill each week. They are fast and easy. There are 3 tests and a final. He gives practice tests that are sooo helpful when you take the test. Watch the lectures, do the assignments, DO THE PRACTICE TESTS!

Accounting is NOT an easy subject, but Ken's lectures bring valuable perspectives into the equations. He is very responsive and has true vocation for the subject matter.  Weekly textbook homework and quizzes, a couple extra credit projects, EXCEL project. Exams are live monitored by a horrible 3rd party company. I would had taken it in person.

I am now a KSU graduate, but Professor Harmon's ACCT2101 was the first Accounting class I had ever taken. I took him for ACCT2102 as well, and ended up switching to an Accounting major, and I am so excited to graduate with this major, and I owe a lot of it to him! Accounting is not an easy class, but he makes it feel more humane.

Dr. Harmon is such a great professor, he helps the best he can as accounting is immense itself. He offers bonus assignments and he drops your lowest exam to help your grade. His lectures are helpful and he gives good examples. Honestly, you have to make sure you are on top of your work yourself regardless of the help because it can be a lot.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Test heavy

comment: Very energized. Breaks down problems from HW and quizzes. Very funny and uses examples to break it down. He asked us to logic things through instead of memorize it. This class actually made me think instead of vomit information I would've studied one night before the test. As long as you practice, this class is an easy A.

Dr. Harmon is an exceptional professor. He truly cares about his students success. He gives plenty of resources so that you can be successful in his class. There is a lot of homework, quizzes and a couple of projects that help you to be prepared for the exams. He offers extra credit. Make sure to do all the work and you will be successful.

Standard KSU accounting class format, just like 2101. The below reviews sum up the rest. He's an amazing professor who wants everyone to do well and exceed. While coming to class isn't mandatory, he does some of the homework problems and test material there, so it's highly beneficial to go.

Take this professor! Explains things well and even posts recordings. Only went to 1 class since the recordings are posted. weekly homework/icecream/quiz assignments but honestly still very easy. Missed a quiz and still ended with a 93%.

TAKE THIS PROFESSOR! He breaks down everything. Watch the concept videos and take notes. He responds fast too via outlook. The test are usually easier than the Homework well for me at least. If you want an easy A take this professor seriously. I attended majority of classes but it's not necessary.
Really nice professor. Easy to follow lectures. Lots of homework but it's kinda needed to really grasp the concepts.

Took this class online. It's honestly a very easy A when you turn in everything. All homework and quizzes have two attempts so you can improve your grade! 4 exams, 1 dropped. Student Excel Project is fairly easy. All homework on connect. Definitely make a schedule for all the assignments due bc it can get pretty stressful.

Harmon is a great professor and super helpful ! Accounting is not an easy class, but he makes it easy to understand. Quizzes are no lockdown, exams are lockdown with camera, you will also have an excel project thats majority of your grade at the end.

1000% taking him again if I can, amazing at explaining concepts, go to class, do your connect assignments and the practice exams and you will easily get an A, always responses to emails quickly, actually gonna miss seeing this guy and looking forward to when I can take him again
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Lots of homework--Accessible outside class

comment: He's one of the best professors I've ever had. He genuinely cares about his students and he really tries to explain certain topics in multiple different ways to make sure everybody thoroughly understood the content. Tests are on Proctorio with webcam, but they weren't too bad. Many bonus opportunities and the other assignments are great practice.
absolutely terrible at teaching, but he curves hella. ridiculously hard class

Ken Harmon is amazing! Accounting is not my best subject, but he explained the concepts extremely well and really makes sure you understand the material. There is a lot of work, but it is overall very beneficial for the tests, and if you do it all, you're almost guaranteed a good grade.

Ken Harmon is one of the best. The clarity with which he explains the topics demonstrates his understanding, and yet you never feel dumb for asking a question or like he wants you to know that he knows more than you I honestly have no suggestions, besides maybe being a little bit more interactive in class, as his style is very lecture heavy.

Ken Harmon is great at conveying difficult concepts and explaining them well. There is a lot of homework but he drops some of it and curves so don't stress too much. Going to class is very recommended as his lectures help very much in understanding the material. He is a great professor!

This professor was amazing! He truly cares! He goes above and beyond to make sure you UNDERSTAND the material, not just memorize it. Hes caring and compassionate. I would take this professor for any class I could. If you do the homework, you will be just fine.

He is caring and willing to go above and beyond to make sure you understand the material. Accounting is normally a real challenge for me. The online videos give the material to study for the test. Rework the homework in the textbook and you will do fine. I would highly recommend this professor and take him again in a heart beat!

Was basically a hybrid class bc of covid. Really great prof. Had great lesson videos & sample problem videos. Tests were straightforward. Grades based off if you show the knowledge, not based on an exact answer. The partner project was pretty time consuming & a bit difficult at times, but he explained the quickbooks part pretty in depth.

Dr. Harmon is the best accounting professor I have ever had. His lectures are great, he always makes sure to fully explain material and check for understanding before moving on. He makes a point to tailor his lectures to MBA students, not accountants which is beyond helpful. Exams are straight forward if you do the exercises.

FANTASTIC! He broke down accounting and made it accessible and easy to understand. He went above and beyond creating lecture and homework solution videos but also showed up weekly to answer people's questions and responded quickly to email.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--Amazing lectures

comment: Dr. Harmon was the best. He explained the material very well and broke it down to us in a way that was very manageable. Prepare for quizzes and a group project.

Dr. Harmon is by far the best accounting professor I've ever had. I took his course during the pandemic so it was all online. He recorded a detailed video for solving every homework question and used class time for questions. Quizzes were fair. He's also an incredibly positive and approachable professor. Highly recommend.
Group project is tough

Prof. Harmon was a great prof. Walks through all of the content clearly. Class consists of no exams or final but there has been talk for exams for future classes, learn smarts, and many labs. You will need the textbook and connect. Definitely recommend Harmon!! Learned a lot of material that I will be using in the future.

Professor Harmon was great! He explained things very thoroughly and made sure everyone understood. The course uses plenty of accounting knowledge that may not be fresh in your head but he ensures to go over it so you understand the concept in its entirety. He's always there to help. 3 exams, gives review questions, 1 group project. Can't go wrong!!
